text: janaya venuven bihi karanu læbu sresthatama samajaya numbala vannehuya. numbala yahapata ana kara ayahapatin valak vannehuya. tavada allah va visvasa karannehuya. tavada deva granthaya læbu janaya da ( muhammad nabi kerehi ) visvasa kale nam eya ovunata yahapatakma vanu æta. ovun aturin visvasavantayo da sititi. tavada ovungen bahutaraya papatarayo ya
